# Task

You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.



# Data

extract_julia_code("""```julia
println("hello world")
```""")

function extract_julia_code(md::String)
    lines = split(md, "\n", keepempty=false) #split markdown into lines
    code_blocks = String[]
    
    in_block = false
    for line in lines
        if line == "```" || (in_block && !startswith(line, "```"))
            push!(code_blocks, join(code_blocks, "\n") * "\n" * line) # close the block and merge with previous blocks 
            in_block = !in_block # toggle the current status of the code block
        elseif in_block && startswith(line, "```julia")
            push!(code_blocks, line[6:end]) # remove the language declaration 
        end
    end
    
    return join(code_blocks, "\n")
end
